_comment_start: RESONANT · PUBLIC METRICS EXPORT — v1.0 | Aggregated · Read-only · Pitch-safe

meta.description: High-level public metrics derived exclusively from intentional listening sessions.

methodology.sessionQualification: Only sessions that meet intentional listening thresholds are included.
methodology.activityWindow: Active listeners are determined using a rolling activity window.
methodology.aggregationLevel: Collective behavior only (no individual or device-level data).
methodology.timeStandard: Durations are expressed in milliseconds; dates follow ISO-8601.
methodology.statusDefinition: Live status reflects freshness of the broadcast state signal.

notes: This file contains no executable logic.
Metrics are aggregated locally and exported as a public snapshot.
Safe for public sharing, press, and partner previews.
Designed to be backend-, BI-, and dashboard-compatible.
_comment_end: END OF FILE — RESONANT PUBLIC METRICS · FREEZE LOCKED
